item.title: GamLetter 0.1.7 (Text Processing)
item.changelog: GamLetter is a frontend for tetex3/scrlttr2 to create (german) letters. It works fine here on Gentoo and gambas2-1.9.25.
item.description: GamLetter is a frontend for tetex3/scrlttr2 to create (german) letters. It works fine here on Gentoo and gambas2-1.9.25.

item.title: playlist repair 0.0-2 (Sound Application)
item.changelog: Playlist-repair scans music-playlists (M3U and PLS) for dead-links (moved or renamed files) and double entries. The search-enginge finds moved and similar named files and replaces the wrong entrys in the playlist.
item.description: Playlist-repair scans music-playlists (M3U and PLS) for dead-links (moved or renamed files) and double entries. The search-enginge finds moved and similar named files and replaces the wrong entrys in the playlist.
